title: The Dayoramap
name: The Dayoramap
description:
A Map by Dayorama

A map of the places mentioned on Dayorama, www.dayorama.com.

properties.name: BBC Somerset Sound
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaTA1 4DA Occasionally visited for a week or two by Ollie during 2005 and 2006 (including the seven minute Santa Special report...).

properties.name: Bath
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaHome of student landlords - Dayorama, March 14 2006

properties.name: Coldroom Studios
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaOX2 9NJOllie\'s band recorded their first proper demo CD here in January 2005. Bit of background on it here: http://www.dayorama.com/archives/000463.html. In March 2006, the demo CD\'s producer at Coldroom, Jimmy Evil, turned up playing guitar for a track which had Channel 4\'s Jon Snow on vocals: http://www.dayorama.com/archives/001581.html.

properties.name: Culham Station
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaCulhamHome of UKAEA Fusion, the UK\'s nuclear fusion research body (Ollie interviewed its director, Prof Sir Chris Llewellyn Smith, in spring 2006). Also home to the coldest, most brutally exposed railway station in the country.

properties.name: Diageo Building
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaW1G 0NBHome to a series of sculptures tracing architectural developments throughout the ages - Dayorama, March 14 2006

properties.name: Inns of Court Law School
properties.description: Posted by Dayorama Amy\'s place of work at the time of writing (16 March 2006).

properties.name: KFC
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaSE171RLThe Walworth Road\'s Kentucky Fried Chicken outlet. It\'s remarkably hard to find a KFC in certain areas of London, as documented by Ollie in the link provided. Also the same KFC in which Ollie - and friends Andy and Ray - hatched a cunning plan to film some TV on location in Sweden and Denmark.

properties.name: Key 103
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaM15 4PRDestination for Ollie\'s placement in April and May 2006.

properties.name: Lamerton
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaPL19 8RRThe amusingly named home of OJ\'s family.

properties.name: Lenham
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaHome of Amy\'s family, including beloved family cat Daisy.

properties.name: Lincoln College
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaOJ lives and works here at the time of writing (16 March 2005). Amy used to until she finished her degree last year - she now lives in Bow, London.

properties.name: London College of Communication
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaOllie\'s place of work at the time of writing (16 March 2006), the broadcast journalism newsroom at the London College of Communcation.

properties.name: Minehead
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaOllie\'s mum lives here, as does Ollie from time to time.

properties.name: Rothermere American Institute, Oxford
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaOX1 3TGOxford University\'s American Institute, frequented by OJ.

properties.name: Rowan Road, Streatham Vale
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaStreatham Vale, LondonOllie lives here at the time of writing (16 March 2006), and has done since October 2005. Cats puke on his carpet and defecate on his bed with a monotonous regularity.

properties.name: Sixfields Stadium, Northampton
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaNN5 5QA Home of Northampton Town FC and also, occasionally, of the auction company for whom Ollie works.

properties.name: Stokenchurch
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaHome of Ollie\'s dad, Toby the transferred terrier (ex-Somerset) etc.

properties.name: Taunton School
properties.description: Posted by Dayorama The school where OJ and Ollie grew up, from around 1991 til 2002.

properties.name: The Bow Quarter
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaAmy lives here at the time of writing (16 March 2006), and has done since the summer of 2005. Alas, her cat Daisy has remained at the family home in Lenham, Kent.

properties.name: The City of Manchester Stadium
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaM11 3FFHome of Ollie\'s beloved Manchester City FC since 2003.

properties.name: eBay UK Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by DayoramaTW9 1EJHotham House in Richmond, home of eBay in the UK. Ollie interviewed an eBay spokesman there in March 2006.
